# Create base container image to be used by all HPCC processes
# MORE - some of these dependencies are probably not needed by all derived containers - perhaps we should move them
# Others may not be wanted at all in container mode - tensorflow, etc  ??

ARG BUILD_LABEL
ARG DOCKER_REPO
FROM ${DOCKER_REPO}/platform-core:${BUILD_LABEL}
USER root

RUN apt-get update -y && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python3-pip --fix-missing && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip

RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir \
    scikit-learn \
    statsmodels \
    networkx \
    setuptools \
    scipy \
    tensorflow

USER hpcc
